input_text:
Job Title: Technical Lead

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company:At CodeMonk, we’re venturing into new territories, shaping the future of diverse and decentralised teams. We know finding the right talents and teams is a major challenge in today’s skills market. That’s why we’re creating a gateway for companies to access the best global talents and teams that are agile and match their business needs.
Through this platform, employers can efficiently and compliantly hire, manage, and pay flexible tech talents and teams anywhere in the world. While reducing costs significantly.
As the world of tech work increasingly embraces a remote-first approach, we’re dedicated to redefining employer-employee working relationships. Our mission is to empower employees with better pay, the opportunity to build world-changing tech solutions, increased work flexibility, and a promising career path.
Website:http://www.codemonk.ai
Skills: JavaScript, React, Angular, Vuejs, HTML, CSS, NodeJs, ExpressJs, MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, RESTful APIs, Git
Key Responsibilities: • Lead the design, development, and maintenance of JavaScript-based applications, both frontend and backend.• Architect and implement scalable and maintainable solutions, ensuring high performance and reliability.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.• Mentor and guide junior developers, providing technical expertise and support.• Conduct code reviews and enforce coding standards to maintain code quality.• Optimize application performance and ensure adherence to best practices.• Implement security measures and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.• Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in JavaScript development.• Proficiency in JavaScript programming language and its frameworks/libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.• Strong understanding of frontend development technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.• Experience with backend technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, or other JavaScript-based frameworks.• Familiarity with database systems like MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL.• Knowledge of RESTful API design and implementation.• Familiarity with version control systems like Git.• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.• Ability to communicate effectively and collaborate with cross-functional teams.• Professional experience in JavaScript development or a related field.
Why we think you'll love working with us:We are early stage and already a profitable venture.You will be part of the journey we’re on, so we offer equity options for important roles along with competitive salary.It will be an exciting stage to join as we are looking to raise our first substantial round this year.Beyond this, there’s plenty more that makes us a great place to work:We are fully remote company with flexible workingWe do not follow 9-5 and work when we are at our best30 days Paid Time OffRegular remote socials with global teamsRegular bounties and other campaigns for you to winPlus more rewards as we grow

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Technical Lead
output_json.summary: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of JavaScript-based applications.
job_responsibilities: Lead the design, development, and maintenance of JavaScript-based applications, both frontend and backend.
Architect and implement scalable and maintainable solutions, ensuring high performance and reliability.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.
Mentor and guide junior developers, providing technical expertise and support.
Conduct code reviews and enforce coding standards to maintain code quality.
Optimize application performance and ensure adherence to best practices.
Implement security measures and ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in JavaScript development.
benefits: Exciting stage to join with potential for substantial funding round
Fully remote company with flexible working hours
Rewards and incentives as the company grows
output_json.company_information: CodeMonk is a platform enabling companies to efficiently and compliantly hire, manage, and pay flexible tech talents and teams globally.

other.content: Company: At CodeMonk, we’re venturing into new territories, shaping the future of diverse and decentralised teams. We know finding the right talents and teams is a major challenge in today’s skills market. That’s why we’re creating a gateway for companies to access the best global talents and teams that are agile and match their business needs. Through this platform, employers can efficiently and compliantly hire, manage, and pay flexible tech talents and teams anywhere in the world. While reducing costs significantly. As the world of tech work increasingly embraces a remote-first approach, we’re dedicated to redefining employer-employee working relationships. Our mission is to empower employees with better pay, the opportunity to build world-changing tech solutions, increased work flexibility, and a promising career path.

Beyond this, there’s plenty more that makes us a great place to work: Fully remote company with flexible working hours, No fixed 9-5 schedule, Regular remote social events, Global team interactions, Rewards and incentives as the company grows
